title: Runes missing
body: Okay so I had greater seals of armor and magic resist on my rune page but I wanted to switch some up so I cleared the page and now i don't have them anymore even thought i have them owned. Please help me

replies.body: I am having the same problem although I am finding the runes available for other rune pages. Just not the ones I need them for.

I looked into your glyph's to see what may have happened with those missing seals. I do see that you still have the 9 Greater Seals of Armor and 9 Greater Glyphs of Magic Resist. If you still aren't seeing them, try refreshing your client by exiting and logging back in. 

If that doesn't make them show up, reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.
